cookieConsent.title: This website uses cookies and tracking technologies
cookieConsent.description:
We only use cookies and other third-party services with your consent to optimize the design of our website and continuously improve it, and to provide you with personalized content and technical innovations that match your individual interests.



By clicking the 'Accept All' button, you agree to the use of all cookies and services. You can select which cookies or services you want to allow via the 'Individual Settings' button.



You can revoke your consent at any time.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Essential cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Statistic cookies help website owners understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

externalMedia.title: External Media
externalMedia.description: Content from video platforms and social media platforms is blocked by default. If external media cookies are accepted, access to this content no longer requires manual consent.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third-party advertisers.
